subject: Indian Polity
topic: Panchayati Raj aur Nagariya Swashasan (73rd & 74th Amendment)
question_en: According to the 73rd Amendment, which of the following is a 'Grama Panchayat'?
question_hi: संवैधानिक विधान के मंत्रों के मूल्यां की जानकारी कैसे प्राप्त हो सकती है।
explanation_en: As per the 73rd Amendment Act, the primary tier of local self-government comes under Block Panchayat (Level-2). In Hindi, it can be explained as 'ब्लॉक पंचायत' (Bhag-2 ki Panchayat).
